Flight school skydiving

Canopy piloting

1. Introduction remove_circle_outline

Whether you’re an aspiring swoop-legend or competing at international level, Skydive Dubai’s canopy piloting courses and coaches can enhance your performance under your wing. Our Flight-1 courses cover everything from basic aerodynamics and effective flaring in the 101 course, to competition preparation and performance in the 302.

International competitions at both Skydive Dubai drop zones enable you to put your new skills to the test, while our training facilities are second-to-none. So if you want to perfect that turn, land with precision, or dip your toes in our world-class swoop ponds, Skydive Dubai will take your flight skills to the next level.
